text: Bab El-Oued City is a 1994 Algerian drama movie. It was directed by Merzak Allouache. It was shown in the Un Certain Regard portion of the 1994 Cannes Film Festival. It won the FIPRESCI Award. ==Cast== * Nadia Kaci - Yamina * Mohamed Ourdache - Said * Hassan Abidou - Boualem * Mabrouk Ait Amara - Mabrouk * Messaoud Hattau - Mess * Mourad Khen - Rachid * Djamila - Lalla Djamila * Simone Vignote - The aunt * Michel Such - Paulo Gosen * Nadia Samir - Ouardya * Areski Nebti - Hassan the baker * Osmane Bechikh - The postman * Fawzi B. Saichi - The shoemender * Fatma Zohra Bouseboua - Hanifa * Ahmed Benaissa - The Imam ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 movies
title: Bab El-Oued City
